page.title: 07HOME LIFE - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: My name is Adam Mill aged 11yrs. It is Tuesday 16th.July 1985 At 7.30am I wake up and get dressed. I play with my{Lego}until breakfast which I have at 8.00am For breakfast I have some{Shreddies}which is a breakfast cereal, and some{Orange {Juice.}After breakfast I played with my{Camelot}which is a game, until 8.40am. At 8.40am I packed my school bag and at 8.50am I took my 6yr old brother to school. When school finishes at 3.40pm we walk home arriving at 4.00pm. I put on different clothes and get my{BMX Bicycle}out of the garage and play with my friend. At 6.00pm I have my supper which is {mushroom soup}followed by{ice cream.} After supper I played with my{Action {Force}toys until 9.00pm.Then I wash, clean my teeth,change into my pyjamas and go to bed.
